text: Hagi pristi vahe'mo'za Ra Anumzamofo huhagerafi huvempage vogisine, golireti'ma tro'ma hu'naza kfane usagenkna namunema ante'naza vogisia eri'za ra have agofetu ante'naze. Ana hute'za ana zupa Bet-Semesi vahe'mo'za Ra Anumzamofontega kre fanane hu ofa nehu'za mago'a ofanena kresramna vu'naze.
